Entries.spring_27: Dear @,^As you might have seen, the town was blessed by a giant sweet potato. ^^To celebrate this blessing, we will honour the sweet potato with a palooza.^You wouldn't want to miss it ^^Make sure to arrive between 12 PM and 6 PM in the town square if you'd like to attend.^ -King Bozo[#]Sweet Potato Palooza Notice
